thread.title: Congress And Trump Admin. Have Already Slashed Nearly $3 Billion Of Obama-era Regulations
thread.title_full: Congress And Trump Admin. Have Already Slashed Nearly $3 Billion Of Obama-era Regulations

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Congress And Trump Admin. Have Already Slashed Nearly $3 Billion Of Obama-era Regulations
text:
04:51pm   
One of the major themes for Donald Trump on the campaign trail was the idea that it’s time to clean up Washington. 
“Drain The Swamp” is a rallying cry that has a lot of different meanings. 
One of the most important things Trump can do is pull back the unnecessary and overreaching regulations put in place by the Obama Administration. 
Trump has already made big progress in that department. 
In fact, you might be surprised to learn just how well that’s going. 
Nearly $3 billion in Obama-era federal regulations have already been slashed by President Trump and Republicans in Congress, a benefit that also saves Americans 41 million hours of paperwork. 
That’s big league. 
It’s been what, about a month since Trump took office? 
This is definitely an encouraging sign and hopefully he keeps it up. LIKE this article?
